response.original_title: Garfield and Friends: Behind the Scenes
response.overview: When he's not gobbling lasagna, taking up couch space or toying with his dog pal Odie, Garfield is busy being one hip Hollywood cat in these hilarious adventures hand-picked by creator Jim Davis! From hosting his own special about how cats are from out of this world (literally!) to animating his own cat cartoon to teaching kittens how to annoy their humans, Garfield is fantastically funny in this exclusive DVD! So bring home the humor, the wit and the fun of everyone's favorite fat cat!
response.tagline: He's Furry! He's Fat! He's All That - And More!
response.title: Garfield and Friends: Behind the Scenes
